attributes.action: Stop the COVID-19 Social distancing and rules and go back to normal life.
attributes.additional_details: Many people are suffering from mental health problems and suffering to cope with life as we know it. The vast majority of younger people are shielding and distancing for people that have lived a long and regular life. Let people live their life as oppose to wasting as, life is precious and is to short to be locked in a bedroom for 9 months. Get on with it, stop the social distancing and learn to embrace this virus as new life. It should be a choice whether you leave your house or not, not a law.
attributes.background: Embrace COVID-19 as the new normal, much like we do with the flu. Go back to life as we knew it post march 2020, abolish social distancing rules and get on with it.
